field.filter: SELECT GenericCommPhysInterface AS G WHERE G.connected_to_interface_id = '' AND G.id != :this->id AND G.connectableci_id = :this->connected_to_device_id AND G.commproto_id = :this->commproto_id

neighbour.query_down: SELECT GenericCommPhysInterface WHERE connected_to_interface_id = :this->id AND connection_impact = 'depends'
neighbour.query_up: SELECT GenericCommPhysInterface WHERE connected_to_interface_id = :this->id AND connection_impact = 'impacts'
